channel.title: Pvp Zone help!

item.title: Pvp Zone help!
item.dc:creator: @Jean_Valjean Jean Valjean
item.description:
@Jean_Valjean wrote:

Ok i got some code but i am confused were to put it. I have put it were he said and just got errors!. Can some on show me were to put this code. Im new and need help.

Add this in client.java Code: [Select] } else if (YourMethodInPlayer.java()) { getPA().walkableInterface(197); getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@ANYTHING HERE", 199); getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);

Post that under your inPcBoat, and the method in player.java. You mustâ€™ve added a method in player.java like
Code: [Select]
public boolean inFunPk() {
if(absX > 2582 && absX < 2602 && absY > 3152 && absY < 3171 ||
absX > 2601 && absX < 2607 && absY > 3156 && absY < 3171){
return true;
}
return false;
}
